description: Cyber Monday deals have mere hours left, and I've found some fantastic offers on four top-rated coffee machines that are even lower than their Black Friday price.
title: Ninja's Luxe Cafe just hit a record-low for Cyber Monday – and it's not the only coffee machine with a better-than-Black-Friday price

author: Mackenzie Frazier
description: Walmart's Cyber Monday sale is officially live for Walmart Plus members, and I'm rounding up tonight's best deals from Apple, Ninja, Dyson, Lego, and more.
title: Walmart's 2025 Cyber Monday sale is live - Apple, Dyson, Ninja and Lego from $8

author: Dan Gardiner
description: Black Friday may be over, but there are still worthwhile Australian deals on Breville coffee machines to be had, and we've got some specific recommendations.
title: The 4 best Breville Black Friday coffee machine deals you can still nab on Cyber Monday – prices from AU$578
